scripts.about-build-docs: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸŒˆğŸ’¯ Build the documentation site' && exit 0
scripts.about-build-icons: echo 'ğŸ—‘ï¸ğŸ§° Remove old icons components and create new ones from the SVGs' && exit 0
scripts.about-build-lib-debug: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸ“¦ğŸ‘ï¸â€ğŸ—¨ï¸ Build the package without minification and watch for changes' && exit 0
scripts.about-build-lib-dev: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸ“¦ Build the package without minification' && exit 0
scripts.about-build-lib: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸ“¦ğŸ’¯ Build the publishable package' && exit 0
scripts.about-clean-docs: echo 'ğŸ—‘ï¸ğŸŒˆ Delete the generated documentation site' && exit 0
scripts.about-clean-icons: echo 'ğŸ—‘ï¸ Delete the generated icon components' && exit 0
scripts.about-deploy-docs: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸŒˆğŸš€ Build the documentation site and publish it' && exit 0
scripts.about-deploy-lib: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸ“¦ğŸš€ Build the publishable package and rsync it (a yarn link alternative)' && exit 0
scripts.about-eslint: echo 'ğŸ¤–ğŸ–ï¸ Run eslint and fix the problems' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-component-info: echo 'ğŸ“ Generate a list of all components, hooks and utils (to be used with rollup)' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-icons: echo 'ğŸ“ Create the icon components from the SVGs' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-lib-config: echo 'ğŸ“ Build a config.json file for the package' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-lib-index: echo 'ğŸ“ Generate the package index.js files' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-lib-package: echo 'ğŸ“ Generate the publishable package.json' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-postcss-json: echo 'ğŸ“ Build the PostCSS JSON files' && exit 0
scripts.about-gen-types: echo 'ğŸ“ Build the typescript definition files' && exit 0
scripts.about-link-lib: echo 'ğŸ§°ğŸ“¦ğŸ”— Build the package and yarn link it' && exit 0
scripts.about-prettier: echo 'ğŸ¤–ğŸ–ï¸ Run prettier and fix the problems' && exit 0
scripts.about-rebase-develop: echo 'ğŸ™ Rebase the develop branch from the main branch' && exit 0
scripts.about-scaffold-test: echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Scaffold a component or composition test' && exit 0
scripts.about-scaffold: echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Scaffold a component or composition' && exit 0
scripts.about-start: echo 'ğŸŒˆğŸ‘ï¸â€ğŸ—¨ï¸ Start the documentation site in development mode and watch for changes' && exit 0
scripts.about-stylelint: echo 'ğŸ¤–ğŸ–ï¸ Run stylelint and fix the problems' && exit 0
scripts.about-test-dev: echo 'ğŸ¤– Run the local tests' && exit 0
scripts.about-test-watch: echo 'ğŸ¤–ğŸ‘ï¸â€ğŸ—¨ï¸ Run the tests and watch for changes' && exit 0
scripts.about-test: echo 'ğŸ¤– Run the CI tests (requires lib)' && exit 0
scripts.about-transfer-docs: echo 'ğŸŒˆğŸš€ Rsync the built documentation site (requires .npmrc)' && exit 0
scripts.about-transfer-lib: echo 'ğŸ“¦ğŸš€ Rsync the built library (requires .npmrc)' && exit 0
scripts.about-validate: echo 'ğŸ¤– Validates the files with eslint and stylelint' && exit 0
scripts.about-watch: echo 'ğŸ¤–ğŸ‘ï¸â€ğŸ—¨ï¸ Watch for typescript errors' && exit 0
scripts.build-docs: yarn clean-docs && yarn install && yarn build-icons && docz build
scripts.build-lib-debug: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build-icons && yarn gen-component-info && yarn gen-postcss-json && npx rollup -c && yarn gen-lib-package && yarn gen-lib-index && yarn gen-lib-config && yarn gen-types && cp ./README.md lib/
scripts.build-lib-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build-icons && yarn gen-component-info && yarn gen-lib-package && yarn gen-lib-index && yarn gen-lib-config && yarn gen-postcss-json && yarn gen-types && npx rollup -c --watch
scripts.build-lib: export NODE_ENV=production && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 && yarn build-icons && yarn gen-component-info && yarn gen-postcss-json && npx rollup -c && yarn gen-lib-package && yarn gen-lib-index && yarn gen-lib-config && yarn gen-types && cp ./README.md lib/
scripts.gen-types: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --emitDeclarationOnly && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.link-lib: yarn unlink && yarn build-lib && cd lib && yarn link && cd -
scripts.rebase-develop: git checkout main && git pull && git checkout develop && git rebase main
scripts.start: yarn gen-postcss-json && yarn build-icons && docz dev
